Source code for maxairesources.datachecks.test.test_dataframe_analysis_spark

from maxairesources.datachecks.dataframe_analysis_spark import SparkDataFrameAnalyser



[docs]def test_binary_classification_report_spark(sample_feast_dataframe_for_analysis):
    analyser = SparkDataFrameAnalyser(df=sample_feast_dataframe_for_analysis)
    analysis_report = analyser.generate_data_health_report()

    # report structure checks
    assert (
        "general" in analysis_report.keys()
    ), "'general' analysis key not found in report"
    assert (
        "uni_variate" in analysis_report.keys()
    ), "'uni_variate' analysis key not found in report"
    assert (
        "bi_variate" in analysis_report.keys()
    ), "'bi_variate' analysis key not found in report"

    # categorical column checks
    cat_col_report = analysis_report["uni_variate"]["c_div"]
    assert (
        cat_col_report["unique_categories_count"] == 3
    ), "error in counting unique values in categorical column"
    assert (
        cat_col_report["null_percentage"] == 7.0
    ), "error in counting null % in categorical column"
    assert (
        cat_col_report["most_common_category"] == "B"
    ), "error in finding most common category in categorical column"
    assert (
        cat_col_report["unique_categories"]["A"] == 33.33
    ), "error in finding share % of category in categorical column"

    # numeric column checks
    num_col_report = analysis_report["uni_variate"]["i_maths"]
    assert (
        num_col_report["kurtosis_score"] == -1.28
    ), "error in calculating kurtosis_score"
    assert (
        num_col_report["kurtosis_type"] == "Mesokurtic"
    ), "error in calculating kurtosis_type"
    assert (
        num_col_report["skewness_score"] == -0.24
    ), "error in calculating skewness_score"
    assert (
        num_col_report["skewness_type"] == "approximately symmetrical"
    ), "error in calculating skewness_type"
    assert (
        num_col_report["skewness_direction"] == "left"
    ), "error in calculating skewness_direction"
